rules_text:
Dreaded Savior's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
{2}{W}: Put your choice of a counter among flying, vigilance, or lifelink on Dreaded Savior.
notes:
https://www.deviantart.com/heliofob/art/Mornfalma-126685294

“At first I mourned my old body, but now I can slay those sick freaks twice as efficiently.”
